verses.verse: Come <S%H7126>near,<s%> ye <S%H1471>nations,<s%> to <S%H8085>hear;<s%> and <S%H7181>hearken,<s%> ye <S%H3816>people:<s%> let the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H8085>hear,<s%> and all that is <S%H4393>therein;<s%> the <S%H8398>world,<s%> and all <S%H3605>things<s%> that come <S%H6631>forth<s%> of it.

For <S%H3588><s%> the <S%H7110>indignation<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1471>nations,<s%> and his <S%H2534>fury<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H6635>armies:<s%> he hath utterly <S%H2763>destroyed<s%> them, he hath <S%H5414>delivered<s%> them to the <S%H2874>slaughter.<s%>

Their <S%H2491>slain<s%> also shall be cast <S%H7993>out,<s%> and their <S%H889>stink<s%> shall come <S%H5927>up<s%> out of their <S%H6297>carcasses,<s%> and the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> shall be <S%H4549>melted<s%> with their <S%H4480>blood.<s%> <S%H1818><s%>

And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6635>host<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%> shall be <S%H4743>dissolved,<s%> and the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> shall be rolled <S%H1556>together<s%> as a <S%H5612>scroll:<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H6635>host<s%> shall fall <S%H5034>down,<s%> as the <S%H5929>leaf<s%> falleth <S%H5034>off<s%> from the <S%H4480>vine,<s%> <S%H1612><s%> and as a <S%H5034>falling<s%> fig from the fig <S%H4480>tree.<s%> <S%H8384><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> my <S%H2719>sword<s%> shall be <S%H7301>bathed<s%> in <S%H8064>heaven:<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> it shall come <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H123>Idumea,<s%> and <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> of my <S%H2764>curse,<s%> to <S%H4941>judgment.<s%>

The <S%H2719>sword<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is <S%H4390>filled<s%> with <S%H1818>blood,<s%> it is made <S%H1878>fat<s%> with <S%H4480>fatness,<s%> <S%H2459><s%> and with the <S%H4480>blood<s%> <S%H1818><s%> of <S%H3733>lambs<s%> and <S%H6260>goats,<s%> with the <S%H4480>fat<s%> <S%H2459><s%> of the <S%H3629>kidneys<s%> of <S%H352>rams:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath a <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> in <S%H1224>Bozrah,<s%> and a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H2874>slaughter<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H123>Idumea.<s%>

And the <S%H7214>unicorns<s%> shall come <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> them, and the <S%H6499>bullocks<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> the <S%H47>bulls;<s%> and their <S%H776>land<s%> shall be <S%H7301>soaked<s%> with <S%H4480>blood,<s%> <S%H1818><s%> and their <S%H6083>dust<s%> made <S%H1878>fat<s%> with <S%H4480>fatness.<s%> <S%H2459><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> it is the <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD's<s%> <S%H5359>vengeance,<s%> and the <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H7966>recompenses<s%> for the <S%H7379>controversy<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion.<s%>

And the <S%H5158>streams<s%> thereof shall be <S%H2015>turned<s%> into <S%H2203>pitch,<s%> and the <S%H6083>dust<s%> thereof into <S%H1614>brimstone,<s%> and the <S%H776>land<s%> thereof shall <S%H1961>become<s%> <S%H1197>burning<s%> <S%H2203>pitch.<s%>

It shall <S%H3808>not<s%> be <S%H3518>quenched<s%> <S%H3915>night<s%> nor <S%H3119>day;<s%> the <S%H6227>smoke<s%> thereof shall go <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H5769>forever:<s%> from <S%H4480>generation<s%> <S%H1755><s%> to <S%H1755>generation<s%> it shall lie <S%H2717>waste;<s%> <S%H369>none<s%> shall pass <S%H5674>through<s%> it <S%H5331>forever<s%> and <S%H5331>ever.<s%>

But the <S%H6893>cormorant<s%> and the <S%H7090>bittern<s%> shall <S%H3423>possess<s%> it; the <S%H3244>owl<s%> also and the <S%H6158>raven<s%> shall <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in it: and he shall stretch <S%H5186>out<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> it the <S%H6957>line<s%> of <S%H8414>confusion,<s%> and the <S%H68>stones<s%> of <S%H922>emptiness.<s%>

They shall <S%H7121>call<s%> the <S%H2715>nobles<s%> thereof to the <S%H4410>kingdom,<s%> but <S%H369>none<s%> shall be <S%H8033>there,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> her <S%H8269>princes<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H657>nothing.<s%>

And <S%H5518>thorns<s%> shall come <S%H5927>up<s%> in her <S%H759>palaces,<s%> <S%H7057>nettles<s%> and <S%H2336>brambles<s%> in the <S%H4013>fortresses<s%> thereof: and it shall <S%H1961>be<s%> a <S%H5116>habitation<s%> of <S%H8565>dragons,<s%> and a <S%H2681>court<s%> for <S%H1323>owls.<s%> <S%H3284><s%>

The wild beasts of the <S%H6728>desert<s%> shall also <S%H6298>meet<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> the wild beasts of the <S%H338>island,<s%> and the <S%H8163>satyr<s%> shall <S%H7121>cry<s%> <S%H5921>to<s%> his <S%H7453>fellow;<s%> the screech <S%H3917>owl<s%> <S%H389>also<s%> shall <S%H7280>rest<s%> <S%H8033>there,<s%> and <S%H4672>find<s%> for herself a place of <S%H4494>rest.<s%>

There <S%H8033><s%> shall the great <S%H7091>owl<s%> make her <S%H7077>nest,<s%> and <S%H4422>lay,<s%> and <S%H1234>hatch,<s%> and <S%H1716>gather<s%> under her <S%H6738>shadow:<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> shall the <S%H1772>vultures<s%> <S%H389>also<s%> be <S%H6908>gathered,<s%> every <S%H802>one<s%> with her <S%H7468>mate.<s%>

Seek <S%H1875><s%> ye out <S%H4480>of<s%> <S%H5921><s%> the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H7121>read:<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> of <S%H4480>these<s%> <S%H2007><s%> shall <S%H5737>fail,<s%> <S%H3808>none<s%> <S%H802><s%> shall <S%H6485>want<s%> her <S%H7468>mate:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> my <S%H6310>mouth<s%> <S%H1931>it<s%> hath <S%H6680>commanded,<s%> and his <S%H7307>spirit<s%> <S%H1931>it<s%> hath <S%H6908>gathered<s%> them.

And <S%H1931>he<s%> hath <S%H5307>cast<s%> the <S%H1486>lot<s%> for them, and his <S%H3027>hand<s%> hath <S%H2505>divided<s%> it unto them by <S%H6957>line:<s%> they shall <S%H3423>possess<s%> it <S%H5704>forever,<s%> <S%H5769><s%> from <S%H1755>generation<s%> to <S%H1755>generation<s%> shall they <S%H7931>dwell<s%> therein.
